body: ...and then I read insanityblitz, and he summed it up nicer. but I felt the gorey details are necessary for people not acquainted with the fate universe :P

@zmod since you went there, Jack the ripper is the embodiment of all abandon children (including abortions) she is all the orphans and discarded children who crave their mother, specifically the womb. Jack's goal is to return to mother's womb, literally. As in she will gut you, rip you open, climb inside and sit in you. Male or female doesn't matter, if you are an adult you are mother, if you treat her well, she will put off "returning to the womb" if you displease her, well...
@Vulcanus42 not so much  mothers love more of a proper birth remember kids Jack the Ripper is the embodiment of aborted fetuses and dead children of London!
@zmod: It's nothing (intentionally) sexual. Jack is just desperate for a mother's love and so refers to any Master that summons her as "mother/mommy", regardless of their actual gender.

Is girls calling the guy "mother" some weird new roleplay fetish? (don't fetish-shame don't fetish shame)
Cause I've heard of "daddy" before but "mother" is... new...
Looks more like kagami and his twin of lucky star
The fact is just a bed and the charcters, makes it feel like a dream in a weird infinite place. Just vaporwave made me feel that, now a hentai did
@Ekkss_Dee It is written mother in raws eksdee
Idk man, it's just not satisfying enough
Mother is correct, you clearly don't know what you are talking about. How are you trying to correct people if you don't have raws/know Japanese or don't know the source material?
Nope, mother is the right word
translation is iffy "mother" should be master
